GSILabs.BModel

Class Artist

  • java.lang.Object
    • GSILabs.BModel.Artist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Performer, java.lang.Comparable

    public class Artist
extends java.lang.Object
implements Performer, java.lang.Comparable
    Artist implements the interface Performer. Each artist has a unique name and a description. It's possible to an artist to have or not a webpage.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates an artist without webpage.
      Artist(java.lang.String n, java.lang.String d, java.lang.String w)
      Creates an artist with webpage.

        public java.lang.String getName()

      • setWorkDescription

        public void setWorkDescription(java.lang.String description)
        Overwrites the description for the given performer. This is done regardless of the description that was previously associated with the performer (if any).
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
